document.full_text: people in the libyan city of misrata are crammed five families to a house in the few safe districts to try to escape mortar rounds being fired by government forces, a rebel spokesman said thursday.
document.title: residents shelter from mortars in libya's misrata
lines_and_colors: people in the libyan city of misrata are crammed five families to a house in the few safe districts to try to escape mortar rounds being fired by government forces, a rebel spokesman said thursday.
